name: Ranger's Dye
flavorText: Hunters and bandits alike use the bark of the Gorsenna plant to blend in with the rustic green shadows of the forest.
flavorTextHtml: Hunters and bandits alike use the bark of the Gorsenna plant to blend in with the rustic green shadows of the forest.
description: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
descriptionHtml: Changes the color of a single piece of armor.
